summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2017 FORD TRANSIT. WHILE DRIVING 55 MPH, THE CONTACT HEARD A LOUD UNKNOWN NOISE UNDERNEATH THE FRONT END OF THE VEHICLE. THE CONTACT ALSO STATED THAT THE VEHICLE FAILED TO ACCELERATE. THE CONTACT COASTED THE VEHICLE OVER TO THE SIDE OF THE ROAD AND NOTICED THAT THE DRIVESHAFT WAS DISCONNECTED FROM THE TRANSMISSION COUPLINGS. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC, BUT WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE DEALER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AND DID NOT ASSIST. THE CONTACT WAS REFERRED TO NHTSA. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 127,000.
